articles.title: Chinese Spy Balloon Used US Internet To Communicate: Report - NDTV
articles.description: A US official revealed that the Chinese spy balloon, which traversed the United States in early 2023, used an American internet service provider to transmit periodic data related to navigation and location back to China, CNN reported.
articles.content:
China has consistently maintained that the balloon was a weather balloon that had veered off course.
